title: Holiday Event Checker
description:
EVENTS shows the output Y with TRUE special days and also
provides the names of the events at the output NAME. EVENTS can also
take into account events over several days. The array ELIST name, date
and duration of events are set.
In the external array ELIST can defne up to 50 such events in the followiï¿¾ng format.
*.NAME : STRING(30) specifes the name of the event
*.DAY : SINT Events of the month
*.MONTH : SINT Month of Events
*.USE : SINT Duration of the event in days
name: EVENTS

input.name: DATE_IN
input.description: The date to check for holiday events.

input.name: ENA
input.description: Enable signal to determine if the holiday event check should be processed.

output.name: Y
output.description: Output indicating if a holiday event is active.

output.name: NAME
output.description: The name of the holiday if an event is active, otherwise an empty string.

in/out.name: ELIST
in/out.description: An array of holiday data structures to check against the input date.
